QuestData.Title: The Bloodletter
QuestData.Description: I have heard a disturbing report, $c.$B$BJust beyond our position, in the Court of Bone, the mogu bring captives to a general named Kaida the Bloodletter.$B$BI will spare you the details, but he thrives on torturing his victims.$B$BThis monster must be stopped. If you fall to his blade, I wish you a swift death.
